name: Transmutation
description: Alchemists who reshape matter and energy to their will.

2.name: Transmutation Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy a transmutation spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Minor Alchemy
2.description: Temporarily transmute a nonmagical object made of wood, stone, iron, copper, or silver into another of those materials for up to 1 hour.

6.name: Transmuter's Stone
6.description: After 8 hours of work, create a stone granting a chosen benefit (darkvision, extra speed, Constitution save proficiency, or elemental resistance) while carried; you can change the benefit when you cast a transmutation spell.

10.name: Shapechanger
10.description: Add polymorph to your spellbook and cast it on yourself once without expending a spell slot, transforming into a beast of CR 1 or lower; regain use after a short or long rest.

14.name: Master Transmuter
14.description: Consume your transmuter's stone to produce a major transformation, panacea, raise dead, or restore youth effect.
